comment: Attack by serious but nowhere near as dangerous as attacks was planning . They decided to hit bases they knew were fortified , resulting in no US or coalition loss of life . If this is full response it shows actions succeeded in restoring deterrence .

(m / multi-sentence

                  :ARG1 (a2 / attack-01)

            :ARG0 (t / they)

                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (b / base

                                    :ARG0 t))))
            :ARG1-of (r / result-01
                  :ARG2 (l / lose-02
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (o / or
                              :op1 (c2 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "US"))
                              :op2 (c3 / coalition))
                        :ARG1 (l2 / life))))
      :snt3 (s2 / show-01

                  :ARG1 (t2 / this)
                  :ARG1-of (f2 / full-09))
            :ARG1 (s3 / succeed-01
                  :ARG0 (a3 / act-02)
                  :ARG1 (r3 / restore-02
                        :ARG0 a3
                        :ARG1 (d3 / deterrence)))
            :condition r2))
